author: Phil Vickery
method: Heat the oil in a frying pan and gently fry the chopped potato for 4-5 minutes. Add the garlic, season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper and continue to fry for a further 4-5 minutes.  Add the vinegar and tomato and stir well. Cook gently until the tomato starts to break down and the potatoes are tender, 10-15 minutes.  Stir in the chopped fresh herbs and serve immediately as a side dish.
ingredients: 2 tbsp vegetable oil,  1 baking potato, peeled and chopped into small cubes,  2 garlic cloves, halved,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  1 tbsp red wine vinegar,  ¼ beef tomato, seeds removed, chopped,  2 tbsp fresh basil leaves, torn,  1 tbsp chopped fresh coriander
